mapper.select: select distinct hi.aptCode, hi.buildYear, hi.apartmentName, hi.dong, hi.jibun from houseinfo hi join housedeal hd on hi.aptCode = hd.aptCode where hi.aptCode in (select aptCode from myhouse where user_id = #{user_id})
mapper.delete: delete from myhouse where aptCode = #{ac} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select aptCode, apartmentName, lat, lng from ( select ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{curlat} ) ) * cos( radians(lat)) * cos( radians( lng ) - radians(#{curlng}) ) + sin( radians(#{curlat}) ) * sin( radians(lat) ) ) ) AS distance, aptCode, apartmentName, lat, lng FROM houseinfo ) data where data.distance < 1
select apartmentName, lat, lng from houseinfo where apartmentName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
